title: 98/648/EC: Commission Decision of 5 November 1998 amending Decision 97/217/EC establishing groups of third countries which are able to use the veterinary certification for imports of wild game meat, farmed game meat and rabbit meat from third countries (notified under document number C(1998) 3332) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 5 November 1998 amending Decision 97/217/EC establishing groups of third countries which are able to use the veterinary certification for imports of wild game meat, farmed game meat and rabbit meat from third countries (notified under document number C(1998) 3332) (Text with EEA relevance) (98/648/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 97/217/EC is replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
